function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Children without access to internet or digital devices for remote learning","Impact":"Lack of access to education and nutrition","Mitigation":"Provide access to digital devices and internet, support school-based nutrition programs","Technologies":"Digital devices, internet connectivity solutions","People":"Children from marginalized sections, refugee children, migrant children, children affected by conflict","Owner":"Government, education authorities, NGOs"},{"Description":"Disruption of global education and lack of distance-learning solutions","Impact":"Exclusion of children from online education, potential increase in child labor","Mitigation":"Develop distance-learning solutions, support educational programs in developing countries","Technologies":"Distance learning platforms, educational technology","People":"Children in developing and underdeveloped countries","Owner":"Education authorities, NGOs, technology companies"},{"Description":"Severe impact of socio-economic and financial impacts on vulnerable households","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to child labor, socio-economic disparities","Mitigation":"Support vulnerable households, address socio-economic disparities","Technologies":"Social support programs, financial aid, economic empowerment initiatives","People":"Marginalized minority groups, disabled individuals, street-connected and homeless populations, single or child-headed households, migrants, refugees, internally displaced persons","Owner":"Government, NGOs, social support organizations"}]}
